scripts.reset: pnpm m exec -- rm -rf dist && pnpm m exec -- rm -rf build && pnpm i --force
scripts.bundle: pnpm i --no-lock --prod --shamefully-flatten --force && pnpm m exec -- rm -rf dist/package.json && pnpm m run bundle:package
scripts.postbundle:
echo '

******   node_modules have been flattened and resolved in production mode.  If this is a dev environment, make sure you run `pnpm run reset` from the root to reset.'
